description:
An update for Fire Emblem Warriors™ is now available from Nintendo eShop.
All customers who own a copy of Fire Emblem Warriors™ should download the update. This will update the software to Version 1.5.0 with the following amendments:

- Various bug fixes.


• Once the update has been downloaded, it will be installed automatically.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused, and recommend downloading this update to ensure a smooth game experience.
name:
Fire Emblem Warriors™:
Update
